field.name: summary
field.value: CVSI 0.2 + Resharper 2.5 causes massive increase in memory usage leading to VS2005 lockup

field.name: description
field.value:
Opened the attached view file and added the line #set($switchValue=$question.Type) before the #blockcomponent. Resharper memory usage (as shown in bottom right hand corner of IDE) climbed from ~20MB to over 800MB within 20 - 30 seconds and IDE became progressively less responsive, eventually requiring me to end the process as I could not close it.
I have narrowed the cause down to something in between CVSI 0.1 (MSI release) and CVSI 0.2 by repeating the above test with the same results a number of times, I then uninstalled CVSI and reran the test and did not see any runaway memory use (but that results in an ugly editing experience). I reinstalled CVSI 0.1 and tried the test again, this time I had the nice colorising and no runaway memory use.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: This defect has been fixed in 0.3.2.
